text: That seems like a lot of work. Just use chrome enterprise, push out a GUID to each computer, and centrally manage chrome updates. I'm on a 36-hour window and their stuff gets closed really hard if they ignore. Plus if you're super paranoid and not running an AppLocker variant, a portable version of chrome would get updated as well.

I'm on a 36-hour window and their stuff gets closed really hard if they ignore. Plus if you're super paranoid and not running an AppLocker variant, a portable version of chrome would get updated as well.
